content: <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, thank you. Thank you for watchin' the meteor shower with me.
info: 看流星雨-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: Runnin' into you and being invited to live here... {A害羞冒烟}That's the bestest gift The Skies Above could ever bless me with.
info: 看流星雨-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: If every shooting star in the sky is a friend up in the cosmos... then those wishes we just made...
info: 看流星雨-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A观察顶处}So everyone's planets can be up in the sky sparklin' away... Who'da thunk? If I wasn't lookin' at it with my own two eyes, I'd never believe it.
info: 看流星雨-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: When shooting stars zip across the sky, all shiny 'n' flickerin'—Do you think they're wavin' at our Planet mah~?
info: 看流星雨-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A小害羞}I really want to respond to them, but how do we do that...? Can we make our planet "wink"?
info: 看流星雨-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A灵光一现}Oh~! So these lickle guys are the ones makin' our wishes come true... right mah~?
info: 看流星雨-云果闲聊_主流程文本3
